channel.title: dbhub.io on DB Browser for SQLite
channel.description: Recent content in dbhub.io on DB Browser for SQLite

item.title: First release of Python library 'pydbhub'
item.description: Thanks to the excellent effort of @LeMoussel, there is now a Python library for people to use and access their SQLite databases on DBHub.io. ðŸ˜„ It’s called pydbhub, and is available here: https://github.com/LeMoussel/pydbhub And on PyPi: https://pypi.org/project/pydbhub/
